law.catch_line: In Allegany County any city, town or municipal body shall have the right to pass ordinances not inco...
law.text: In Allegany County any city, town or municipal body shall have the right to pass ordinances not inconsistent with this article providing for the regulations and control of all licensees under this article which shall be situate within the limits of the said city, town or municipality, or within one mile thereof, in order to assist in the enforcement of this article.
